verse.gurmukhi: murdw hoie murIdu n glI hovxw[
verse.unicode: ਮੁਰਦਾ ਹੋਇ ਮੁਰੀਦੁ ਨ ਗਲੀ ਹੋਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: Only by becoming dead in life, i.e. totally detached, and not through mere verbal jargon one can become a true disciple.

transliteration.english: muradhaa hoi mureedh na galee hovanaa|
transliteration.hindi: मुरदा होइ मुरीदु न गली होवणा।
transliteration.en: muradhaa hoi mureedh na galee hovanaa|
transliteration.hi: मुरदा होइ मुरीदु न गली होवणा।
transliteration.ipa: mʊrəd̪ɑ hɔeɪ mʊrid̪ nə Gəli hɔʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: مُردا هوا مُریِد ن گلیِ هووݨا۔

verse.gurmukhi: swbru isdik shIdu Brm Bau Kovxw[
verse.unicode: ਸਾਬਰੁ ਸਿਦਕਿ ਸਹੀਦੁ ਭਰਮ ਭਉ ਖੋਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: One could be such a person only after getting sacrificed for truth and contentment and by eschewing delusions and fears.

transliteration.english: saabar sidhak saheedh bharam bhau khovanaa|
transliteration.hindi: साबरु सिदकि सहीदु भरम भउ खोवणा।
transliteration.en: saabar sidhak saheedh bharam bhau khovanaa|
transliteration.hi: साबरु सिदकि सहीदु भरम भउ खोवणा।
transliteration.ipa: sɑbər sɪd̪ək səhid̪ ɓərəm ɓo kʰɔʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: سابر سدک سهیِد بھرم بھا کھووݨا۔

en.bdb: The true disciple is a boughten slave who is ever busy in the service of the Master.

verse.gurmukhi: nw iqsu BuK n nId n Kwxw sovxw[
verse.unicode: ਨਾ ਤਿਸੁ ਭੁਖ ਨ ਨੀਦ ਨ ਖਾਣਾ ਸੋਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: He forgets hunger, sleep, food and rest.

transliteration.english: naa tis bhukh na needh na khaanaa sovanaa|
transliteration.hindi: ना तिसु भुख न नीद न खाणा सोवणा।
transliteration.en: naa tis bhukh na needh na khaanaa sovanaa|
transliteration.hi: ना तिसु भुख न नीद न खाणा सोवणा।
transliteration.ipa: nɑ t̪ɪs ɓʊkʰ nə nid̪ nə kʰɑɳɑ sɔʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: نا تس بھُکھ ن نیِد ن کھاݨا سووݨا۔

en.bdb: He  grinds fresh flour (for free kitchen) and serves by fetching water.

verse.gurmukhi: pKy dI qwgId pg mil Dovxw[
verse.unicode: ਪਖੇ ਦੀ ਤਾਗੀਦ ਪਗ ਮਲਿ ਧੋਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: He fans (the congregation) and washes nicely the feet of the Guru.

transliteration.english: pakhe dhee taageedh pag mal dhovanaa|
transliteration.hindi: पखे दी तागीद पग मलि धोवणा।
transliteration.en: pakhe dhee taageedh pag mal dhovanaa|
transliteration.hi: पखे दी तागीद पग मलि धोवणा।
transliteration.ipa: pəkʰe d̪i t̪ɑGid̪ pəG məl t̪ɔʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: پکھے دیِ تاگیِد پگ مل دھووݨا۔

verse.gurmukhi: syvk hoie sMjIdu n hsxu rovxw[
verse.unicode: ਸੇਵਕ ਹੋਇ ਸੰਜੀਦੁ ਨ ਹਸਣੁ ਰੋਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: The servant  always remains disciplined and has nothing to do with wailing and laughing.

transliteration.english: sevak hoi sa(n)jeedh na hasan rovanaa|
transliteration.hindi: सेवक होइ संजीदु न हसणु रोवणा।
transliteration.en: sevak hoi sa(n)jeedh na hasan rovanaa|
transliteration.hi: सेवक होइ संजीदु न हसणु रोवणा।
transliteration.ipa: seʋək hɔeɪ səŋd͡ʒid̪ nə həsəɳ rɔʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: سےوک هوا سںجیِد ن هسݨ رووݨا۔

verse.gurmukhi: dr drvys rsIdu iprm rsu Bovxw[
verse.unicode: ਦਰ ਦਰਵੇਸ ਰਸੀਦੁ ਪਿਰਮ ਰਸੁ ਭੋਵਣਾ।

en.bdb: This way he becomes dervish at the door of the Lord and gets drenched in the delights of the rains of love.

transliteration.english: dhar dharaves raseedh piram ras bhovanaa|
transliteration.hindi: दर दरवेस रसीदु पिरम रसु भोवणा।
transliteration.en: dhar dharaves raseedh piram ras bhovanaa|
transliteration.hi: दर दरवेस रसीदु पिरम रसु भोवणा।
transliteration.ipa: d̪ər d̪ərəʋes rəsid̪ pɪrəm rəs ɓɔʋəɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: در دروےس رسیِد پرم رس بھووݨا۔

en.bdb: He will be seen as the first moon of Id day (which the Muslims eagerly wait for in order to break their long fasts), and only he will come out as a perfect man.
